channel.title: Emily's Data Blog
channel.description: Seeking Answers through Data Science and Visualizations

item.title: Hello, world.
item.description:
Hey there. I've decided to start a blog chronicling my explorations in data science and visualizations.

I've built this blog with the Clean Bootstrap Theme for Jekyll and GitHub pages. I'm going to try and use only images that I've taken, but I'll note when they're not. For instance, this image is from Nasa on the Commons since it was included in the template and I felt it was oddly appropriate.

I've decided my first project will be examining economic inequality in Cambodia, since it really struck me while I was there a year ago.

I'll keep tweaking this as time goes along; it's not quite perfect yet.

Thanks for checking this out!
